ygData.subject: Re: Question?
ygData.msgSnippet: You really should read the list more... it is posted in the Magi Lore v1.2 message... Rutree the ever grateful for Elkantar s work. ... From: David Platt
ygData.messageBody:
You really should read the list more... it is posted in the Magi Lore v1.2
message...

Rutree the ever grateful for Elkantar's work.
----- Original Message -----
From: David Platt <davidp@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 1:31 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Question?


> From: David Platt <davidp@...>
>
> Hello all,
>
> Quick question for ya all.
>
> I was in Unrest and someone was selling some blood-stained gloves for 40
> plat. He said they were great for mages but before I could get the stats
on
> the gloves my wonderous ISP gave me a swift to the arse and when I
returned
> the fellow was gone. Anyone out there able to tell me what the stats on
the
> gloves are? And are they worth the 40 plat? Seems pretty high for some
golves.
>
> Thanks for you time,
>
> Mirrin of Nife
>
>
